comments:
1) Create a managed bean in session scope.
2) Select the new bean so that it's edit information appears on the right side of the edit form.
3) Select the scope drop down and  change the scope to application.
4) The bean will not move to the application scope in the tree on the left side  the exceptions below get logged.

The application data seems okay and switching to a different tab and back to refresh the UI seems to solve the problem.
